title: I don't know how much more BS I can handle from this community
body:
Lose 2 matches because you play a lategame champ and top/bot feed their asses off.  Then go jungle, lose that match too because troll draven with a match history of ranked flex suddenly decides he wants to jump into solo/duo with his buddy leona and intentionally feed.

Fuck this game.  All I ever get when I play it is a ton of anger and stress.

replies.body:
No offense, but you have a thread 12 days ago about how you can't play the game anymore because of the behavior, and a thread 3 months ago where you said you were done with the game.

I think you need to actively look around for a game to replace league if you don't like it, otherwise you're going to keep coming back (and then complain about it).

> I think you need to actively look around for a game to replace league if you don't like it, otherwise you're going to keep coming back (and then complain about it).

When you find that game please notify me.  Also why does it matter what I've said in the past?  Does it invalidate what I say now?  I want to enjoy this game but the shitty low elo community drives me nuts.  It's a love-hate relationship.

A plethora of MMOs.

The various other games inspired by dota such as dota 2, smite, and hots.

And yeah, it does kinda matter what you were saying in the past. Because all I'm seeing right now is the behavior must not affect you much, because you keep playing. It just affects you enough that you complain about it.
Oh hes like the guy who says AFK 10000 times in a match then keeps playing.
You should not be playing pvp games, you are clearly too young. Come back when you can control yourself and deal with losses.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=IURtWcQT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-14T03:47:36.256+0000)
>
> You should not be playing pvp games, you are clearly too young. Come back when you can control yourself and deal with losses.

Because you've never been upset or frustrated in this game at all right?  Yeah I've "dealt" with around 12 or so losses over the past 2 days.  Everyone has a breaking point.

Of course i have, in rare cases where it was completely unwarranted and out of control. 
I see no reason to blame my team (most of the time), the game, the devs, our lord and savior jesus elvis christ, or shitpost about it on the forums.
In all honesty, this saltiness reminds me of those days I used to play minecraft (which was like 3-4 years ago)
